title: Quotible React Frontend
excerpt: React hooks user interface to interact with Quotible API

title: Quotible Express Backend

title: Northern Wind And Southern Sun

title: Mark'ie
excerpt: Mark'ie is a syntax focused category based web text editor
summary: Mark'ie is an opinionated markdown journal prototype that takes a different approach to content organization and workflow.

title: Yoga Of Words
excerpt: Yoga of Words is an uplifting poetry and prose experience
summary: Yoga of Words is an uplifting poetry and prose experience centralized around a reading experience met to release the audience from the noise of life. Allowing the reader to relax and be restored by heartfelt words.
